text: Edward Ludlow Mooney (March 25, 1813 – July 10, 1887) was an American painter. ==Biography== Edward Ludlow Mooney was born in New York City on March 25, 1813. He was trained by Henry Inman and William Page, and was known for his portraits of famous politicians and officials.
